t: The Untold Truth Of Thrive Market - Mashed
s: February 14, 2023 - In the few years it's been around, ... well, thrived. The pandemic has certainly helped propel the online grocery retailer to success, shooting its 40% year-over-year revenue increase to 90%. However, it's the company's curated selection and focus on health and wellness that seem to keep it on track toward growth (via Forbes). Co-founded Sasha Siddhartha tells Forbes, "Our approach has always been curated, so you don't have to worry about which brand is better ...
